title: Data Mining for Maintenance: How to Turn Your "Data Swamp" into Reliability Gold

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Data Mining for Maintenance: How to Turn Your "Data Swamp" into Reliability Gold

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic shot inside a modern, clean manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of reliability engineers (male and female) wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests are gathered around a large industrial machine (like a compressor or turbine). One engineer is pointing at a tablet held by another (showing only the back of the device), while they look at the machine, discussing. In the background, slightly blurred, are automated production lines and digital displays showing data graphs. The lighting is professional, combining cool industrial blue tones with warm accent lighting on the machinery. No text or words visible in the image. High resolution, 8k.
